title: Bug 2120 - MRU File List not persisted between sessions
OB: When I open the File menu, the Most Recently Used (MRU) file list is displayed. However, when I close the application and reopen it, the MRU file list is empty.
EB: The MRU file list should be persisted between sessions, so that previously opened files are still displayed in the list when the application is reopened.
SR:
1. Launch the application.
2. Open several files.
3. Verify that the opened files appear in the File menu MRU list.
4. Close the application.
5. Reopen the application.
6. Open the File menu.
7. Verify that the previously opened files are still displayed in the MRU list.
